content: The talk of playoff superstardom, specifically with Russ, Giannis, and Harden, is well warranted but not a mention of Kahwi? I feel like this could be his year to really jump into superstardom with a stellar playoff run by methodically taking down Houston and then upsetting the Warriors. The Warriors mental strength is still a question mark to me that the Spurs have the ability to disrupt. Should be a very intriguing last three rounds of the playoffs!
